steps.conclusion: None. Titles are in Portuguese, single-topic, ≤5 words, no level/joiner words. english_title translations are accurate. is_language_course is false for all. Icons have the required tabler- prefix. Output adheres to APP_LANGUAGE and maps a vague input to canonical computing courses.
Slight opportunity missed: did not include "Ciência da Computação," which is a common canonical option listed in expectations for vague coding intents. Not an error, just a minor omission.

Consider adding "Ciência da Computação" to round out the canonical set for a vague goal like "I want to code." Optionally, include one or two more adjacent broad tracks (e.g., "Desenvolvimento Mobile") while keeping titles single-topic and ≤5 words.
